text: “Kodi chiliponso chomwe akudikilira osati zotsatira zake (za bukulo)? Ndipo tsiku lakudza zotsatira zake, adzanena amene kale sadalilabadire: “Ha! Atumiki a Mbuye wathu adadzadi ndi choonadi (tsopano tikuvomereza). Kodi tingakhale nawo ife aomboli oti atiombole (kwa Mbuye wathu), kapena tingabwezedwe kuti tikachite (zabwino) osati zija tinkachita?” Zoonadi adziononga okha, ndipo zawasowa zabodza zomwe adali kupeka
